title: Find overseas customers and export opportunities

introductory_paragraph.content:
Use great.gov.uk to:

* make sure your business is ready to export
* show your products directly to overseas buyers through the ‘find a buyer’ service
* find overseas opportunities for your product or service

Use great.gov.uk to:

  • make sure your business is ready to export
  • show your products directly to overseas buyers through the ‘find a buyer’ service
  • find overseas opportunities for your product or service

more_information.content:
## Find overseas customers online

Get help [selling online overseas](https://selling-online-overseas.export.great.gov.uk/markets) and take advantage of special deals negotiated by the government.

And join the e-exporting programme to get:

* advice on developing a strategy from e-commerce and international trade experts
* special rates for some of the world’s most popular online selling platforms
* regular updates on e-commerce trends and opportunities to hear from industry experts and network with other online traders

Contact <e-exporting@trade.gsi.gov.uk> to join the e-exporting programme.

## Get help from a trade specialist

The Department for International Trade (DIT) has a network of trade specialists who can also help you find overseas customers by:

* helping you prepare for a [trade show or overseas market visit](https://www.events.ukti.gov.uk) (sometimes grants are available - check with the event organiser)
* arranging introductions to potential overseas buyers, agents and distributors (there’s a charge for this service)

To find out more, first see the [export guidance](https://www.export.great.gov.uk) on great.gov.uk, then [contact a trade adviser](http://www.uktiofficefinder.ukti.gov.uk/contactSearch.html) in your region.

## Defence, security and cyber security

Contact the Defence and Security Organisation (DSO) for help with:

* presentations, product demonstrations and hosting delegations (including a bespoke hanger for exhibitions and [demonstration centre](https://cyberexchange.uk.net/#/cdc) for cyber security products)
* displaying your products on the DSO stand at [exhibitions and trade shows](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/defence-and-security-exporting-event-and-exhibition-support)
* booking military personnel to appear on your stand at an exhibition or trade show
* providing after sales training to customers

$C

DSO Export Support Team\\
<UKTIEST-IHubMailbox@mod.uk>\\
Phone: +44 (0)1980 845 361\\
[Find out about call charges](/call-charges)   

$C

DSO provides media support for product launches or overseas campaigns. Call +44 (0)20 7215 8467.

*[DSO]: Defence and Security Organisation
*[DIT]: Department for International Trade

Find overseas customers online

Get help selling online overseas and take advantage of special deals negotiated by the government.

And join the e-exporting programme to get:

  • advice on developing a strategy from e-commerce and international trade experts
  • special rates for some of the world’s most popular online selling platforms
  • regular updates on e-commerce trends and opportunities to hear from industry experts and network with other online traders

Contact e-exporting@trade.gsi.gov.uk to join the e-exporting programme.

Get help from a trade specialist

The Department for International Trade (DIT) has a network of trade specialists who can also help you find overseas customers by:

  • helping you prepare for a trade show or overseas market visit (sometimes grants are available - check with the event organiser)
  • arranging introductions to potential overseas buyers, agents and distributors (there’s a charge for this service)

To find out more, first see the export guidance on great.gov.uk, then contact a trade adviser in your region.

Defence, security and cyber security

Contact the Defence and Security Organisation (DSO) for help with:

  • presentations, product demonstrations and hosting delegations (including a bespoke hanger for exhibitions and demonstration centre for cyber security products)
  • displaying your products on the DSO stand at exhibitions and trade shows
  • booking military personnel to appear on your stand at an exhibition or trade show
  • providing after sales training to customers

DSO Export Support Team
UKTIEST-IHubMailbox@mod.uk
Phone: +44 (0)1980 845 361
Find out about call charges

DSO provides media support for product launches or overseas campaigns. Call +44 (0)20 7215 8467.
